endpoints.description: Retrieve projected yield estimates based on specific input parameters.
Submit data related to a recent logging operation for analysis and storage.
Retrieve a list of supported tree species for data processing.
Obtain environmental factor data for a specified region.
Retrieve details of a specific location based on its unique identifier.
Submit specific parameters to calculate forest yield.
Fetch analytics for a particular report specified by its identifier.
Update information for a specific logging operation.
Remove a specific log entry identified by its unique ID.
Retrieve compliance rules and guidelines for a specific location.
